:root { --accent: #ad1f64; } body { font-family: sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } header { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 1rem; text-align: center; } main { padding: 1rem; } .hero { text-align: center; margin-bottom: 2rem; } .chips { display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; } .chips span { background: var(--accent); color: white; padding: 0.5rem 1rem; border-radius: 1rem; } .grid { display: grid; gap: 1rem; } footer { background: var(--accent); color: white; text-align: center; padding: 1rem; }
